name: Fortune Summoners: Secret of the Elemental Stone
name_original: Fortune Summoners: Secret of the Elemental Stone
description:
Fortune Summoners: Secret of the Elemental Stone is a RPG-arcade game developed by Lizsoft. It was originally released in 2012. Carpe Fulgur published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
Fortune Summoners: Secret of the Elemental Stone is available on PC.
